author: jkuhnert
msg: Fixes TAPESTRY-726. Base parameter for finding asset was documented as optional but required because of
a Defense.notNull check. Confirmed that base wasn't required to operate and removed the defense check.

author: wsmoak
msg: Use the released version of struts-mailreader-dao.

author: gsingers
msg: Uses JUnit Task defined tempDir instead of system temp.

author: jmarino
msg: refactor builder exceptions, making them checked and introducing stronger typing; introduce recursive exception formatting so nested builder exception data is displayed

msg: Make sure some text is output, otherwise link disappears
